titleStmt.title: At the sign of the Wheat-Sheaf in Bedford-Berry, (near Covent-Garden) up one pair of stairs, the back-door coming into Deans-alley, being very private, liveth a physitian, who has a method that cures the French disease in a more easie way than can be expected, ...

notesStmt.note: Title from first few lines of text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
